mapper.insert: insert into member (MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_ADDRESS, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_GENDER, MEM_ACCOUNT, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_EMAIL_CK, POSTNUMBER, DETAIL_ADD) values (#{memId},#{memPw},#{memAddress},#{memName},#{memPhone},#{memBirth},#{memGender},#{memAccount},#{memEmail},#{memEmailCk},#{postNumber},#{detailAdd})
